level.heading: DISPOSABLE CARRYOUT BAG FEE REQUIREMENT (ยง 21-1001) Except as provided in Section 1006, a retail establishment shall charge eachustomer making a purchase from the establishment a fee of five cents ($0.05)or each disposable carryout bag provided to the customer with the purchase. The fee imposed by Section 1001.1 shall be charged to a customer making aurchase whether the purchase is in person, through the internet, by telephone,y facsimile, electronically, or by any other means. The retail establishment shall indicate on the customer transaction receipt theumber of disposable carryout bags provided, and the total amount of the feeharged. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 7208, 7209 (August 13, 2010).
